name: Price Rhythm
tag_list: consumer-preferences, decision-making-process, shopping-advisor, retail, barcode-scanner, compare-prices, personal-recommendation, product-reviews
overview:
Price Rhythm is a shopping decision support tool for smart phones. The app learns a user’s profile and helps him in reaching better shopping decisions.

After the apps create a shopping profile for the user it is able to provide different layers of information that helps him reach a smarter decision.

Price Rhythm is a platform which available for online and mobile devices (iOS, Android, Windows Phone and Blackberry (Playbook)).

Price Rhythm implements a unique model for making shopping decisions. The model is based on iterative cycles, in which, each consumer examine his / her decision through a different angles. Each consumer can take a different path depending on his / her preferences, physical location and the product that he / she are looking for. The model’s different angles include a personalized recommendation (take into consideration hundreds of general and personal parameters), exploring available and relevant data, gathering information from social channels and examining the product and its specifications.

By improving consumer’s satisfaction Price Rhythm increases key matrices, such us conversion, retention etc.

Price Rhythm’s Targetable Actions is an advanced mechanism that allows a targeted “call for action” based on the consumer’s profile on a specific product and other varies parameters.
